sub_title: IT Support & Testing Specialist / Freelance Translator
summary: Experienced IT support & (certified) testing specialist, as well as qualified Polish, English and French translator. I excel at attention to detail, creating a positive atmosphere, open communication and improving processes. I like deep-diving into a specialized subject, but I am also always open to learning new things. Naturally a night owl and open to working in later hours.
